member.name: T:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.Moq.Extensions.DbContextExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for the db context type.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.Moq.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.CreateMock``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates and sets up a mocked db context.
member.remarks: dbContextToMock would typically be an in-memory database instance.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.Moq.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.CreateAndAttachMockedDbSetTo``2(Moq.Mock{``0},``0)
member.summary: Creates and attaches a mocked db set to a db context mock.

member.summary: Creates and attaches a mocked db query to a db context mock.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.Moq.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.AddExecuteSqlCommandResult``1(``0,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations to return a specified result.
member.param: The integer to return when ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.Moq.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.AddExecuteSqlCommandResult``1(``0,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations containing a specified sql string to return a specified result.
member.param: The ExecuteSqlCommand sql string. Set up supports case insensitive partial matches.
The integer to return when ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.Moq.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.AddExecuteSqlCommandResult``1(``0,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter},System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations containing a specified sql string and sql parameters to return a specified result.
member.param: The ExecuteSqlCommand sql string. Set up supports case insensitive partial matches.
The ExecuteSqlCommand sql parameters. Set up supports case insensitive partial sql parameter sequence matching.
The integer to return when ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.
